replies.bodyText:
There is no way to confirm global layout listeners were added  since ViewTreeObserver is final and does not  have any constructors.
android.view.ViewTreeObserver$CopyOnWriteArray which holds mOnGlobalLayoutListeners is also package private and there is not way one can use it or stub it
